com.jcabi.aether

Class Aether

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jcabi.aether.Aether

  • @Loggable(value=1)
public final class Aether
extends Object
    Resolver of dependencies for one artifact.

    You need the following dependencies to have in classpath in order to to work with this class: 

     org.sonatype.aether:aether-api:1.13.1
 org.apache.maven:maven-core:3.0.3
    Since:
    0.1.6
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
    See Also:
    Aether 1.13.1 JavaDoc, Classpath
    To do:
    #143 This class should be @Immutable, but RemoteRepository is not immutable. Let's create a new class to encapsulate all necessary properties from RemoteRepository.
    Suppressed Checkstyle violations:
    ClassDataAbstractionCoupling (500 lines), ClassFanOutComplexity (500 lines)

        To do:
        #51 This "filter IF NOT NULL" validation is a workaround, since I don't know what the actual problem is. Looks like sometimes (for some unknown reason) #classpathFilter() returns NULL. When exactly this may happen I have no idea. That's why this workaround. Sometime later we should do a proper testing and reproduce this defect in a test.
